definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: I remember that the chili con carne was very good taste.
sentences.chinese: 我记得墨西哥炖肉味道非常好。

sentences.english: One dish is always asked for over and over—pot roast and potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 其中有一道菜他们百吃不厌，那就是炖肉加土豆。

sentences.english: He ate a whole tin of stew.
He consumed a large plateful of the very savory stew.
sentences.chinese: 他吃光了一大盆很可口的炖肉。

sentences.english: She chopped onions to put in the stew.
sentences.chinese: 她把洋葱剁碎放进炖肉中。

sentences.english: She grabbed the third bowl and gobbled it down.
sentences.chinese: 她抓过第三碗炖肉狼吞虎咽地把它吃掉了。

sentences.english: It is suitable for ready-to-eat meals and convenience foods such as soups, stews and pasta.
sentences.chinese: 它适用于即食餐和方便食品，如汤，炖肉和面食。

sentences.english: She served a flavorous stew to her friends.
sentences.chinese: 她接待友人香馥馥的炖肉。

sentences.english: The Amazonians love jambo leaves, which they use to flavour stews and soups.
sentences.chinese: 亚马逊人喜欢蒲桃叶，用它来给炖肉和汤调味。

sentences.english: Vaughn says the package is ideal for soups, stews and pastas .
sentences.chinese: 沃恩说，包装是理想的汤，炖肉和面食。

sentences.english: He ladled a bowl of stew for himself.
sentences.chinese: 他给自己盛了一碗炖肉。

sentences.english: Game, Roasted meat, Stewed and braised meat, Hard cheese.
sentences.chinese: 适宜搭配野味，烤肉，焖肉和炖肉，以及硬芝士。

sentences.english: Food Suggest: roasted or braised red meats, game, aged cheeses.
sentences.chinese: 搭配烤肉或炖肉，野味及陈乳酪都十分美味。

definition: to stir-fry/to do the cooking/stir-fried dish
pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
to cook in a small quantity of water
to simmer/soup made by simmering for a long time
